# controlTint

**Instance Property**

The tab view’s control tint.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var controlTint: NSControlTint { get set }
```

## Discussion

The valid values for this property are described in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControlTint]. The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControlTint/defaultControlTint].
title: controlTint
